Package pt.isel.leic.svlc.pod.http

Class PodmanHttp

java.lang.Object
pt.isel.leic.svlc.pod.http.PodmanHttp
All Implemented Interfaces:
Podman
public class PodmanHttp extends Object implements Podman
Implements the Podman interface to manage Podman containers and pods through HTTP requests. This class provides methods to create, start, stop, and prune pods, as well as to create containers and pull and delete images.

  • Constructor Details

    • PodmanHttp

      public PodmanHttp(String podName, String image, String ports)
      Constructs a PodmanHttp instance with specified configurations.
      Parameters:
      podName - The name of the pod to be managed.
      image - The registry path for pulling images.
      ports - The port mappings in "hostPort:containerPort" format.
